title: T206 Sweet Caporal 350-460/42OP Ty Cobb Red Portrait PSA 4 - REDUCED
author: maj78

posts.post_title: T206 Sweet Caporal 350-460/42OP Ty Cobb Red Portrait PSA 4 - REDUCED
posts.post_content:
This is a POP 3 with the factory 42 Overprint caption. Only one graded higher than PSA 4. One of the other PSA 4s recently sold for $13,200 with multiple surface issues and off-centered from left to right.  

I am asking $13,750 net, via PayPal. I will pay to overnight it to the buyer.

Please PM me or email [url]matt@gentryfinancialgroup.com[/url] to purchase or ask questions. Thanks!
